\n Aaron Trousers - Orang.productDescription:
Named after my grandfather, Aaron Katcher.


        The Brave GentleMan Aaron trouser is a slim-fitting pant inspired by a classic military cut. Durable organic cotton duck canvas combines with classic suit tailoring for handsomely dressed-up work-wear that is versatile enough to be worn with everything from a suit to a tee shirt. • Made with organic cotton duck grown and milled in India• Corozo buttons • Organic cotton batiste piping and pocketing. • Expertly and fairly constructed in New York City's famed Garment District.* This season of pants runs about 1 size small. If you typically wear a 30, get a 32*
\n Aaron Trousers - Orang.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear Aaron Trousers - Orange - PANTS

\n Light Gray Twill Pants.productDescription:
The light gray twill suit pants are made in New York City with an organic cotton twill milled in India. Pocket-lining is made in charcoal-colored, light, organic cotton batiste. The fit of our pants are narrow, tapered and slender. They are true-to size, but being that they are slender, if you prefer a looser fit, you can go up one size. 
Pair with the Light Gray Tuxedo Jacket for a two-piece tuxedo
        Features Include:• Organic cotton grown in India• Corozo button fly• manufactured in New York City's historic garment district under fair labor conditions • suitable for vegans• Genderless
\n Light Gray Twill Pants.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear Light Gray Twill Pants - SUITS

\n Glen Plaid Suit Pants\.productDescription:
The Glen Plaid pants are made in New York City with an organic cotton canvas. Pocket-lining in velvety, Turkish-milled future-silk made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.
* This season of pants runs about 1 size small. If you typically wear a 30, get a 32* 
        Features Include:• organic cotton canvas in traditional glen plaid• corozo button fly• recycled PET (water bottle) pocketing, milled in Turkey • manufactured in New York City's historic garment district under fair labor conditions • suitable for vegans
\n Glen Plaid Suit Pants\.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear Glen Plaid Suit Pants - SUITS

\n Brave Gentleman Virtua.productDescription:
We present to you the ultimate gift card from Brave GentleMan. Give it to your friends, family, or anyone who appreciates quality menswear. Let them choose between our selection of belts, shoes, accessories, and menswear as well as our grooming products.

        Upon credit approval, we'll e-mail the Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Card (and your personal message, if you wish) to the gift recipient.
Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards may be redeemed at BraveGentleman.com available in your choice of denominations $25, $50, $75, $100, $200, $500, $1000.
Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards expire after one year from date of purchase.

Note:
The Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Card is sent to the recipient's e-mail address, not the shipping address we ask you for during checkout.
Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards may be treated the same as cash.
Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards are not redeemable for cash, nor can they be returned for a cash refund.
Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards cannot be purchased with a Brave Gentleman Gift Card
Delivery to an incorrect but deliverable e-mail address is the sole responsibility of the purchaser.*
Delivery to a non-existent e-mail address is the sole responsibility of the purchaser.*
Brave Gentleman is not responsible for lost or stolen Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Cards.*
* We will do our best to provide you the highest level of customer service in these cases.
\n Brave Gentleman Virtua.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear Brave Gentleman Virtual Gift Card - SUITS

\n The Blackwood\n.productDescription:
Organic cotton t-shirt to benefit Animal Equality with original art by tattoo artist Meagan Blackwood.
        Brave GentleMan has teamed up with three amazing tattoo artists on limited-edition, sustainable tees to benefit the crucial work of Animal Equality. Tattoo artists / animal advocates Meagan Blackwood, Ruby Gore and Hannah Willison each created original art that we printed organic cotton tees grown, sewn and printed in America. These super-soft, high-quality tee-shirts are ethically made and 100% traceable. See our printed garment tag for traceability details and enter them here: whereyourclothing.com.
While the sales of these shirts do benefit Animal Equality, they are not tax deductible.

\n SIDE-ZIP PULLOVER - DE.productDescription:
We took a refined, tailored approach to the classic sweatshirt shape, adding side-zips and denim-jacket style sleeve buttons for this outerwear-crossover.
        A timeless pullover cut in luxurious Brazilian future-wool tweed made from recycled cotton / recycled poly. FEATURES:- the recycled cotton/poly tweed is made in a dye-free process through color separation prior to recycling.- no animal products, suitable for vegans.
* (please note size XS and S have a scoop neck with a larger opening, without a neck band)

\n White Armor Shirt\n.productDescription:
This is the ultimate white shirt with a masculine twist: the chest piece. This white shirt is whitened without bleach and goes with everything from jeans or shorts to a tuxedo. 
        The Brave GentleMan  White Armor Shirt is constructed in New York City's historic garment district with lux 500 TC organic cotton milled in India. Featuring a chest layer inspired by the masculine lines of armor, raw corozo buttons, a button-down collar, and a slender, tailored fit.
\n White Armor Shirt\n.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear White Armor Shirt - TOPS

\n The Operative, Brown\n.productDescription:
The Operative is part of our iconic Signature Collection.
** THIS IS AVAILABLE FOR PREORDER ONLY **SHOES WILL BE DELIVERED IN JANUARY 2018
        The Operative is part of the Brave GentleMan Signature Collection. These iconic shoes are hand-stitched in Brazil by expert shoemakers and crafted in hi-tech, Italian PU future-leather that is Ecolabel Certified by the European Union.  With a sleek silhouette, this double monk features brogue detailing, a toe-cap, and is constructed using the Blake-Rapid technique (synthesizing the best aspects of Goodyear and Blake methods), resulting in a stronger, more waterproof and sturdy shoe. The sole is layered by hand in natural hard-rubber (more durable than a leather sole) and every pair is made with flushed metal toe and heel taps to extend the life of the shoes by minimizing common wear and tear of the sole. The Signature Collection features hand-brushed patina and comes with dust-bags to protect the shoes.

Vegan
Made in fair labor conditions
EU Ecolabel-Certified uppers
Natural hard-rubber soles
\n The Operative, Brown\n.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear The Operative, Brown - SHOES

\n The Envoy, Black\n.productDescription:
The Envoy is part of our iconic Signature Collection.
** THIS IS AVAILABLE FOR PREORDER ONLY **SHOES WILL BE DELIVERED IN JANUARY 2018
        The Envoy is part of the Brave GentleMan Signature Collection. These iconic, wholecut oxfords are hand-stitched in Brazil by expert shoemakers and crafted in hi-tech, Italian PU future-leather that is Ecolabel Certified by the European Union.  With a sleek silhouette, this nearly-seamless oxford is constructed using the Blake-Rapid technique (synthesizing the best aspects of Goodyear and Blake methods), resulting in a stronger, more waterproof and sturdy shoe. The sole is layered by hand in natural hard-rubber (more durable than a leather sole) and every pair is made with flushed metal toe and heel taps to extend the life of the shoes by minimizing common wear and tear of the sole. The Signature Collection features hand-brushed patina and comes with dust-bags to protect the shoes.

Vegan
Made in fair labor conditions
EU Ecolabel-Certified uppers
Natural hard-rubber soles
\n The Envoy, Black\n.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear The Envoy, Black - SHOES

\n Longwing, Camel\n.productDescription:
The Longwing in camel features brogue detailing and a classic shape. The entire Brave GentleMan footwear collection is expertly made in Portugal using future-leather, a supple, durable, Italian-milled, EU Ecolabel Certified, hi-tech microfiber, superior to animal leather.
        The Longwing shoe is made in Portugal in fine Italian future-leather. Part of the ongoing collaboration: Brave GentleMan x Novacas, The "Advocate" is durable, breaks-in wonderfully, is suitable for vegans, and the uppers are made with Italian microfiber which rivals leather like no other. Handsome inside and out
100% VeganFair LaborSustainable (EU Ecolabel Certified Uppers)

\n Advocate Grip, Mahogan.productDescription:
Refined meets rugged when our classic, mahogany tassel loafer is taken to new heights with a grip sole. The Brave GentleMan  footwear collection is expertly made in Portugal using Future-leather, a supple, durable, Italian-milled, EU Ecolabel Certified, hi-tech microfiber, superior to animal leather.
        The "Advocate" is a tan tassel loafer made in Portugal in fine Italian future-leather. Part of the ongoing collaboration: NOVACAS x Brave GentleMan, The "Advocate" is durable, breaks-in wonderfully, is suitable for vegans, and the uppers are made with Italian microfiber which rivals leather like no other. Handsome inside and out
100% VeganFair LaborSustainable
** PLEASE NOTE ** The loafer-style shoes should feel too small and too tight when you first put them on (you may even struggle getting them the first couple of times, so please use a shoe horn) but do trust that after one or two wears, they break-in to your standard size. If you size up, they will be soon be too loose.

\n FUTURE-LEATHER CONDITI.productDescription:
Brave GentleMan's Future-Leather Conditioner is the ultimate tool to keep your shoes  and accessories looking great. Whether you are shining, buffing, protecting or bringing new life to an old shoe, we've got you covered. Our product is hand-made here in brooklyn using organic, plant-based oils and waxes.
        Directions: Using a rag or cloth, apply a light coat of conditioner to the desired area. in in small, circular motions, massage the conditioner in. Use a soft-bristled brush if desired to buff.

Ingredients:organic coconut oil, organic carnauba wax, organic flax oil, essential oils

*this is a plant-oil based product and can oil-stain clothing. 
*this is a safe, non-toxic formula that is actually good for your skin.
\n FUTURE-LEATHER CONDITI.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear FUTURE-LEATHER CONDITIONER - ACCESSORIES

\n Wayward Boot, Pebble G.productDescription:
NOW IN STOCK
The Brave GentleMan footwear collection is expertly made in Portugal using Future-leather, a supple, durable, Italian-milled, EU Ecolabel Certified, Hi-Tech microfiber, superior to animal leather.
        The "Wayward Boot" is a triple-monk strap boot with a serious edge. Built in black pebble future-leather with a hard sole, this versatile boot can be dressed up or down. 

Care Instructions: • All Brave GentleMan shoes and boots can be cared for similarly to any fine footwear.• Standard polishes, waxes, and dressings (and waterproofers for future-suede) can be applied.• Spot-clean with a damp cloth. • Use a gentle hand-soap and soft toothbrush for more difficult spots and stains. • After normal wear and tear, soles and heelpads can evetually be replaced at standard shoe repair/cobbler shops.• Beware of the use of mink oil (a product of the fur industry) at cobblers, shoe-shiners and repairs. Request that it is not used.

\n Lover\n.productDescription:
NOW IN STOCK
The Brave GentleMan footwear collection is expertly made in Portugal using Future-leather, a supple, durable, Italian-milled, EU Ecolabel Certified, Hi-Tech microfiber, superior to animal leather.
        The "Lover" is our take on the classic Chelsea boot. With Victorian roots, the Chelsea boot became iconic among mods and rockers of the 1960s in Britain. Simple, edgy and sexy, this boot can be worn with everything from a suit to a pair of tattered jeans and a band tee. 
100% VeganFair LaborSustainable

\n Faunus Portfolio - Cam.productDescription:
The Faunus portfolio is made in New York City using supple and strong Italian, hi-tech PU microfiber that is Ecolabel-Certified by the European Union.

100% vegan
Made fairly in Brooklyn, NY

\n Hi-Tech Microfiber Cro.productDescription:
The Brave GentleMan Crossfit Grip.
        The Brave GentleMan Crossfit grip is the only Crossfit grip offering full-palm protection (including the thenar), as well as thumb-forefinger webbing protection and wrist support, while leaving your fingers free to maneuver based on subtle skin-contact sensations. This grip prevents the most common hand injuries resulting from Crossfit / gymnastics, and lifting movements like skin tears, and offers performance support for pull-ups, muscle-ups, rings, kettlebell, barbell and dumbbell movements.
Features:

High-tech, Italian-milled PU microfiber
Sweat and chalk-activated
Improves, breaks-in and becomes supple over time
EU-Ecolabel certified material
100% Vegan 
Crafted by hand New York City under fair labor conditions

LARGE - measures 4" across to base of thumb & 4.5" tall from base of palm to base of middle finger.SMALL - measures 3" across to base of thumb & 3.5" tall from base of palm to base of middle finger.FINGER HOLES start off tight and will break in after a couple of uses. Please do not cut them.
\n Hi-Tech Microfiber Cro.pageTitle: Brave GentleMan : Disruptive Menswear Hi-Tech Microfiber Crossfit Grip - ACCESSORIES

\n Black Twill Tuxedo Jac.productDescription:
The Black Twill Tuxedo Jacket is made in New York City with an organic cotton twill milled in India, and an upcycled polyester charmeuse lapel. Lining is made in charcoal, light organic cotton batiste. The fit of the jacket is slender and true-to size, but being that it is slender, if you prefer a looser fit, you can go up one size. 
Pair with the Black Twill Pants for a two-piece tuxedo
        Features Include:• Organic cotton grown in India• Corozo button• manufactured in New York City's historic garment district under fair labor conditions • suitable for vegans• Genderless

\n Gray Tweed Blazer\n.productDescription:
*SIZING ALERT*All Brave GentleMan blazers are European-Slim-Fit. This mean that if you typically wear a US 40 jacket, you should order a 42 in Brave GentleMan.
The gray tweed blazer is made in New York City with a tight-weave, future-wool tweed milled in Brazil with a blend of 100% recycled cotton and recycled poly. Fully lined in velvety, Turkish-milled future-silk made from 100% recycled plastic bottles, this single-button blazer is simple and masculine.
        Features include:• recycled Cotton / recycled poly outer milled in Brazil• recycled PET (water bottle) lining milled in Turkey • corozo buttons• manufactured in New York City's historic garment district under fair labor conditions • suitable for vegans

The organic cotton, double breasted blazer is made in New York City with a luxurious organic cotton tweed milled in Italy. Fully lined in velvety, Turkish-milled future-silk made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.
        Features include: 
• tweedy 100% organic cotton milled in Italy • Natural dye • corozo button fly • Pocketing made from 100% recycled PET (plasric bottles) milled in Turkey• manufactured in New York City's historic garment district under fair labor conditions • suitable for vegansns
